title: Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop
notes: Had one random freeze in 5 hours of gameplay.  Also, character progress does not save unless you create symbolic link of your /home/<username>/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/Alien Swarm Reactive Drop/reactivedrop/cfg/ folder (the cfg folder itself; right click "make link" on the cfg folder to make a symbolic link) and browse to /home/<username>/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/563560/pfx/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/ and create the following folders within that directory: /steam/steamapps/common/Alien Swarm Reactive Drop/reactivedrop/ and put the cfg symbolic link there, rename it from "Link to cfg" to just "cfg" (without quotes).  With the above instructions, <username> being your steam user name, so change that to what your user name is.  That will fix the game not maintaining character progression.

title: Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop
notes: When running using default settings or Proton 3.7.3, it does not start. Using 3.7.5-beta, it does start.
No issues with game play or controls.
